scripts.test: npm run linter && mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register tests/**/*.ts
scripts.build:dev: rimraf dist && npm run linter && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --progress --colors --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: rimraf dist && npm run linter && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --colors --config ./webpack.config.js
